name: Lollipuff
headline: Online Auctions for Authentic (Women's) Designer Goods
description:
Lollipuff is the only online auction site that pre-screens each and every item to guarantee the authenticity of its high-end, pre-owned designer apparel and accessories.

Buyers can be confident they're getting the real deal, and sellers never have to worry about listing their luxury pieces alongside counterfeits. Combining the buyer security of an upscale boutique with the amazing prices of an online auction, Lollipuff is the go-to site for authentic, affordable and on-trend designer fashion.

## What People Are Saying About Lollipuff
Previous
"I love using your website. I buy and sell used handbags, and your service has helped me in purchasing and selling my bags. Thanks again."
- Debbie H.
"Your authentication service has been invaluable in allowing me to buy online with peace of mind. The site is easy to use and well designed and the service is extremely quick. Cannot thank you enough!"
- Louise F. 
"We have used Lollipuff’s authentication services where we require second opinions on particularly complex authentications. They have proven themselves extremely knowledgeable and reliable in their authentication assessments." 
- Luxe.It.Fwd - https://luxeitfwd.com.au/
"We at Brandvilleshop absolutely love Lollipuff. They helped us grow our business over the years. They have always been fast and never wrong in hundreds of authentications. We have used many authentication companies before, but Lollipuff is a leader in the authentication industry."
- Brandvilleshop.com
"You have the fastest, most accurate authentication service. I have used and recommended Lollipuff for over 5 years. I’ve tried other authentication companies in the past, but none compare to Lollipuff’s service. "
- Allison S.
"You are the fastest authentication service I have ever used! And I believe the best one too! Thank you so much."
- Jingyi C.
"Thank you, very impressed with your quick and professional response! I hope that the buyer will feel safe buying this bag now. Will definitely recommend your services to anyone. " 
- Matilda W.
"I have a luxury second hand shop and I use Lollipuff's certificates of authenticity as a service to my customers. I feel sure of what I am selling."
- R.C. 
"Thank you so much for your super super fast authentication service that was received within the hour. I used to use another authenticator and they normally took 2-3 days. Lollipuff will be my go to authentication site from now on. I am very pleased and impressed by your prompt response."
- Han T. 
"Thank you so much! I wasn’t expect such fast turn around (30 minutes!)! I was quite confident in the authenticity because the seller is reputable, but it’s nice to get a 3rd party opinion. Now I’m really proud of scoring this authentic piece for such a low price! I highly recommend this service!"
- Nickkita L.
"What a fast, prompt and seamless authentication process you guys have rendered. Thank you. You can count me as one satisfied client." 
- Nurliyana R.
"Thank you so much. I am from Turkey. Your service and expertise is the ONLY one in the world I rely on and trust, also you saved me from from losing a total of 25,000 Euros on a counterfeit Birkin and Kelly! You are the BEST!!! "
- Ilgin O.

generated_description:
**Lollipuff** is an innovative online auction platform specializing in authentic women's designer goods. Founded as a unique marketplace, Lollipuff's mission is straightforward: to provide buyers with the confidence that every item is verified for authenticity, ensuring they get the real deal without the shadow of counterfeits.

Located in Mountain View, California, and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch W13, Lollipuff operates with a small, dedicated team of 11 employees. The platform combines the personal touch of an upscale boutique with the competitive pricing of an online auction, making luxury fashion accessible to a broader audience. Their website, [lollipuff.com](http://lollipuff.com), is the go-to destination for anyone looking to buy or sell high-end, pre-owned designer clothing and accessories. 

Every item on Lollipuff undergoes a thorough pre-screening process to ensure authenticity. This not only protects buyers but also gives sellers peace of mind, knowing their luxury goods won't be listed alongside knock-offs. Users can utilize Lollipuff's authentication services for a range of items—from handbags to shoes to jewelry—making it a trusted partner for many consignment and online marketplaces globally.

Lollipuff is known for its responsiveness and efficiency. Their authentication service is touted for being incredibly quick, often providing results in under an hour. Customers have shared glowing testimonials about the reliability and speed of the service, emphasizing how it empowers them to make online purchases with confidence. 

This marketplace is more than just about transactions; it's about community and trust. With a clear focus on authenticity and customer satisfaction, Lollipuff is carving out a significant space in the e-commerce fashion landscape. If you're seeking fashionable designer pieces without the fear of fakes, Lollipuff is the answer. 

For more information or to start your luxury shopping experience, visit [lollipuff.com](http://lollipuff.com).
